overview: Utilizing vinyl borrowed exclusively from Afrika Bambaataa's historic and genre-defining record collection, DJ Shadow and Cut Chemist's acclaimed Renegades Of Rhythm set touches down in Oakland, California in this professionally-documented film experience.  You're there in the audience as the two DJ's unravel the evolution of Hip-Hop music and culture, using the same artifacts that helped create it.  "Not just any records- the MASTER OF RECORDS' records."
tagline: This is a Revolution Sure Shot
title: Renegades of Rhythm
